results.description: England are beaten 3-0 by Chinese Taipei in the quarter-finals of the table tennis team World Cup in Tokyo.

results.description: Lenna Cumberbatch on playing table tennis and "safe spaces" in sport as part of BBC Scotland's #8Proverbs series marking Black History Month.

results.description: Paralympic table tennis champion Rob Davies books his spot at Tokyo 2020 after winning the European Para Championships.
